name: koepon-performance-tests
description: Performance testing suite for Koepon application using k6 and Artillery

scripts.test:api: k6 run api/auth-performance.test.js && k6 run api/gacha-performance.test.js && k6 run api/medal-balance.test.js
scripts.test:db: k6 run database/simple-select.test.js && k6 run database/join-query.test.js && k6 run database/aggregation.test.js
scripts.test:frontend: k6 run frontend/page-load.test.js && k6 run frontend/js-performance.test.js
scripts.test:monitoring: k6 run monitoring/resource-monitoring.test.js && k6 run monitoring/error-rate.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:load && npm run test:spike && npm run test:stress

author: Koepon Development Team
